sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create tasks and subtasks for in-flight TOLs. Close already process subtasks and tasks.</description> <name>Create tasks for in-flight TOLs</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var script = "new SamUpgradeTransferOrderLines().createTasksForInflightTOLs();"; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-25 23:13:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c7ef08afa1983300964fa6bc32299bf7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create tasks for in-flight TOLs</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">3e467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f49</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c7ef08afa1983300964fa6bc32299bf7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-25 23:56:58</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
